mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (cust_id, pwd, name, main_addr, mobile_num, gender, email, birth_date, date, image, nickname, acc_price, point, tou, adult_chk, withd_chk, grade_id, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{custId}, #{pwd},#{name},#{mainAddr},#{mobileNum},#{gender},#{email},#{birthDate},#{date},#{image},#{nickName},#{accPrice},#{point},#{tou},#{adultChk},#{withdChk},#{gradeId},#{regDate},#{regId},#{upDate},#{upId})
mapper.select: select IF(COUNT(cust_id>0), 1, 0) FROM customer where cust_id = #{custId}
update customer set pwd = #{pwd}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, mobile_num = #{mobileNum}, gender = #{gender}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, up_date = NOW() where cust_id= #{custId}
